short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turns all Wikipedia sections into links. To copy a link, right-click and select 'Copy Link Address'

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This productivity addon converts all Wikipedia section headers into links. 
To copy a link, right-click and select 'Copy Link Address.'
